## rds-accordion Readme

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


### Properties

| Property        | Attribute       | Description                                                                                                                   | Type     | Default   |
| --------------- | --------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | --------- |
| `selectionMode` | `selectionmode` | This determines the selection mode for the accordion item. If single, it will close other accordionitems when one is clicked. | `string` | `'multi'` |


### Slots

| Slot | Description                                        |
| ---- | -------------------------------------------------- |
|      | Used for adding accordion items to your accordion. |


----------------------------------------------
